duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical and managerial leadership, setting strategy, and driving technology development for the Cybersecurity and Advanced Platforms Subdivision.
Partner with other leaders to define and implement the technical development strategy.
Direct program staffing, allocate resources, and define cross-organizational technical research projects.
Recruit and hire high-quality technical talent and ensure the quality of technical products and deliverables.
Lead analysis of ground, cloud, embedded, and space systems for cyber vulnerabilities and recommend solutions.
Develop cutting-edge prototypes in ground and spacecraft systems and mentor Managers and Directors within the organization.
Actively perform information technology (IT) research and development and provide leadership on the future direction of IT for customers.
Perform business development and ensure the insertion of new technology into programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, electrical engineering, computer engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
